  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class JFXTreeTableView<S extends RecursiveTreeObject<S>>
extends javafx.scene.control.TreeTableView<S>
    JFXTreeTableView is the material design implementation of table view.
    Since:
    2016-03-09 DOC: not completed
